/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a pedestrian's perspective on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the soft sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
